content: 3 r5 decrease single_crochet decrease ch1 turn 3 r6 sc3 ch1 turn 3 r6 sc3 ch1 turn 3 r7 decrease 2 by stitching stitches 1&2 2 r7 decrease 2 by stitching stitches 1&2 2 together then stitches 2&3 together then stitches 2&3 ch1 turn ch1 turn r8 sc2 ch1 turn 2 r8 sc2 ch1 turn 2 r9 decrease 1 r9 decrease 1 ch1 pull tight and fasten_off ch1 pull tight and fasten_off weave in end weave in end finishing the mouth 3 5mm hook 4 0mm will work too ➢ in pink or white depending on your preference pull up yarn just under left side of upper jaw ➢ slip_stitch 3 along corner of mouth ➢ insert hook through both sections of lower jaw and single_crochet together along the edge sc17 ➢ slip_stitch along right corner of mouth ➢ push hook around post where pink and white stitches meet between 1st and 2nd row 9 in upper jaw ➢ pull up loop and slip_stitch continue to slip_stitch all around the pink-white border of the upper jaw to give definition ➢ sltst into left corner of mouth fasten_off and weave in end white lips pink lips you decide ears - make 2 3 5mm hook worked in continuous rounds r1 in beige or pink if preferred 6 sc6 in magic_ring r2 single_crochet increase *3 9 r3 single_crochet switching to dark gray single_crochet 12 increase sc2 increase *2 fasten_off beige r4 sc2 increase *4 16 r5-8 sc16 16 r9 sc2 decrease *4 12 r10 single_crochet decrease *4 8 slip_stitch and finish off leaving a long tail for sewing do not stuff fold in half into a cupped shape and sew on at around rounds 83-84 legs - make 4 3 5mm hook worked in continuous rounds r1 in pink sc6 in magic_ring 6 forming toes r2 increase single_crochet ch4 slst3 into back bumps starting in 2nd 12 chain from hook single_crochet into stitch at base of chain st2 on +toes ring ch4 and slst3 single_crochet into next stitch st 3 on ring ch4 and slst3 single_crochet into stitch at base st3 in ring ch4 and slst3 single_crochet into next stitch st4 in ring ch4 and slst3 single_crochet into stitch at base st4 of ring increase increase switching to dark gray in last stitch r3 in back loops only sc3 single_crochet into the single_crochet stitches 12 between each toe sc5 r4-5 in both loops sc12 12 r6 sc5 increase *2 14 r7 sc14 14 r8 sc6 increase *2 16 r9 sc16 16 slip_stitch and finish off leaving a long tail for sewing stuff lightly if desired or leave un-stuffed sew front legs on at about rounds 71-73 and back legs at about rounds 61-63 congratulations here is your guy now stuff him full of bags
